heading: Heading
visibility-settings-description: Select the box that defines how people will see your dreams.
public-description: Your dream is available to all logged-in users on the platform, along with your profile information.
anonymous-description: Your dream is available to all logged-in users on the platform, but your profile information is not displayed.
private-description: Your dream is available only to you.
sync-failed: Your dream must have a maximum of 10000 characters, but it has
